headTestsStatusSelect.passed:
**Functional Purpose**: Option for filtering solutions by head tests status
**UI Location**: Solutions list → Head Tests Status filter dropdown
**When Users See This**: When selecting a filter option for head tests status
**Technical Context**: Represents 'passed' status; must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Passed"
headTestsStatusSelect.failed:
**Functional Purpose**: Option for filtering solutions by head tests status
**UI Location**: Solutions list → Head Tests Status filter dropdown
**When Users See This**: When selecting a filter option for head tests status
**Technical Context**: Represents 'failed' status; must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Failed"
headTestsStatusSelect.errored:
**Functional Purpose**: Option for filtering solutions by head tests status
**UI Location**: Solutions list → Head Tests Status filter dropdown
**When Users See This**: When selecting a filter option for head tests status
**Technical Context**: Represents 'errored' status; must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Errored"
headTestsStatusSelect.exceptioned:
**Functional Purpose**: Option for filtering solutions by head tests status
**UI Location**: Solutions list → Head Tests Status filter dropdown
**When Users See This**: When selecting a filter option for head tests status
**Technical Context**: Represents 'exceptioned' status; must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Exceptioned"
headTestsStatusSelect.all:
**Functional Purpose**: Option to show solutions regardless of head tests status
**UI Location**: Solutions list → Head Tests Status filter dropdown
**When Users See This**: When selecting a filter option for head tests status
**Technical Context**: Represents 'all' status; must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "All"
headTestsStatusSelect.latestTestsStatus:
**Functional Purpose**: Placeholder text for the Head Tests Status filter when no specific status is selected
**UI Location**: Solutions list → Head Tests Status filter dropdown (selected value display)
**When Users See This**: When the Head Tests Status filter is in its default state
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Latest Tests status"
orderSwitcher.oldestFirst:
**Functional Purpose**: Option for ordering solutions by creation date (oldest first)
**UI Location**: Solutions list → Order filter dropdown
**When Users See This**: When selecting an order option for the solutions list
**Technical Context**: Represents 'oldest_first' order; must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Oldest First"
orderSwitcher.newestFirst:
**Functional Purpose**: Option for ordering solutions by creation date (newest first)
**UI Location**: Solutions list → Order filter dropdown
**When Users See This**: When selecting an order option for the solutions list
**Technical Context**: Represents 'newest_first' order; must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Newest First"
